snippet: The Longhorns’ game plan against West Virginia starts with slowing down quarterback Geno Smith, the top-rated quarterback in the country and early Heisman Trophy favorite.
abstract: Main concern for Texas when it faces West Virginia is slowing down WVU's Geno Smith, college football's top-rated quarterback in the country and early Heisman Trophy favorite.
lead_paragraph: The Longhorns’ game plan against West Virginia starts with slowing down quarterback Geno Smith, the top-rated quarterback in the country and early Heisman Trophy favorite.

headline.seo: Texas Not Hiding Its Concerns About Stopping Geno Smith
headline.main: Texas Not Hiding Its Concerns About Stopping Mountaineers’ Smith
headline.print_headline: Texas Not Hiding Its Concerns About Stopping Smith
